Name: Air Raid Over Britain
About the game: Early Preview : Air Raid Over Britain is currently in Early Preview. This is a early look at our development of a hands-off VR experience. Note: this game is still in production and does not necessarily reflect the final product. Air Raid Over Britain is a short VR experience / technical demo that places you in the heart of a small English town during 'The Blitz' (1940-1941). In this VR experience you can discover facts about WWII through an interactive, look-at mechanic as well as experiencing an immersive, on-the-ground perspective of an actual air raid by German HE-111s. Note: This demo is still a work-in-progress. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions on how we can improve this experience in future builds.
